price: E um dia, os inimigos de Allah serão reunidos com destino ao Fogo; então, se coordenarão,
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يُحۡشَرُ أَعۡدَآءُ ٱللَّهِ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِ فَهُمۡ يُوزَعُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wayawma yuḥ'sharu aʿdāu al-lahi ilā al-nāri fahum yūzaʿūna
